üìÅ ADD YOUR MUSIC FILE HERE

Instructions:
1. Download or obtain your music file (e.g., "Under the Influence" by Chris Brown)
2. Place it in this `public` folder
3. Rename it to: music.mp3
4. The app will automatically play it when the user clicks the play button

Note: Make sure you have the rights to use the music file.
If you don't have the file, the app will still work, but without background music.

Supported formats: MP3, WAV, OGG (MP3 recommended)
